item.title: One-armed robber
item.description:
About This Game

Experience the challenge of robbing banks, but now with only one arm! Grab a friend and you'll have two arms in total.



Unlock and buy new guns, which can be customized to fit your playstyle. If you are trying to go stealth, the optimal choice might be a suppressor, but if you're going loud, damage and bullets is all that matters, so put on an extended mag and get going!



Each heist is suited for any playstyle, whether you want to sneak in and take out guards quietly, or you go in guns blazing shooting everthing in your sight until you reach the vault, the choice is yours.

As you become a more experienced robber new tools will be unlocked, which will make it easier for you to complete the heists. Each tool has a special purpose, and unique tools make it possible to complete heists in new ways you couldn't do before.



Whether you go loud or stealth, once you are in the vault, the objective is the same: Gather as much loot as possible, and get out alive!
If you can't fit all the loot in the vault in your duffel bag, you can either run back to the truck and get a new one, or get your friends to help you carry out everything!

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted 2
item.description:
About This Game

Find out if you have what it takes to be a Fazbear Entertainment Superstar!

Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted 2 is the sequel to the terrifying VR experience that brought new life to the iconic horror franchise. As a brand new Fazbear employee you’ll have to prove you have what it takes to excel in all aspects of Pizzeria management and maintenance.

Go Backstage as a VIP to help Roxanne Wolf & the S.T.A.F.F Bots get ready for their performances in the Pizzaplex Salon!

Head into the Fazcade and enjoy classic games like Bonk-a-Bon and Fazerblast! See if you can top all the high scores!

Take care of things behind the scenes in the Staff Only section of the Pizzeria. Deliver First Aid to patients who aren’t quite feeling themselves, and help animatronics perform routine diagnostics & maintenance.

Our Food Prep courses will help you get the federally mandated amount of value preparing food in the Pizzaplex. Experience all the joys of high-speed food service & get ready to feed some hungry bots!

Head over to the Ticket Booth to test out our E-ticket attractions, such as Captain Foxy’s Cowboy Adventure! On this lighthearted log ride, you’ll float through the old West as a gunslinger in search of booty!

And finally, if you’re short on dread, dive into the world of our Sister Location! These special minigames are VR versions of classic experiences from Five Nights at Freddy’s: Sister Location. These fan-favorites brought to life promise to be as fun as they are terrifying!

So what are you waiting for?!? Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted 2 is now accepting applicants for all positions, effective immediately.

item.title: Kādomon: Hyper Auto Battlers Prologue
item.description:
About This Game




Welcome to the world of Kādomon, a mysterious land where cute and quirky monsters roam freely. Journey through randomly generated regions, battling and collecting Kādomon on your quest to be the best!




There’s 180+ monsters to add to your Kādodex, and each Kādomon has 2 super rare misprints to discover! Find over 60 of these monsters and their misprints to build the ultimate unstoppable team in the Kādomon prologue!




All Kādomon have special characteristics, such as activated abilities, passive abilities and different typings (there’s 12 types in total!). Synergise your Kādomon’s attacks and create a super effective combo of monsters. Grow even stronger with every battle by levelling-up and evolving your team!




Once fully evolved, every Kādomon has the chance to get HYPER! Acquire very rare items that allow your Kādomon to break their limits and discover a hyper-powerful 4th form! With brand new designs and souped-up stats, you’ll be able to tackle the greatest of challenges, in the Kādomon prologue you will be able to discover Hyper Evolution for every starter Kādomon!




Battle your team against elite enemies and bosses. Get your team ready to fight against MEGA opponents, and unlock brand new Kādomon if you win! Remember, there is always a greater foe to test your strength!




The Kādomon world is bustling with secrets, including random events that will change the tide of battle! In the Early Access release, experiment with different items and monsters, Kādomon might evolve in different ways, and if you’re lucky you might just encounter a Legendary Kādomon to join your team…




In between battles, take a mosey around Shonkka's Shop! Here you can use the Money Berries you’ve earned to buy new Kādomon and items. Held items are incredibly useful to have as they give you permanent buffs or powerful single use effects when used wisely!

item.title: Norgame. Город полярной ночи
item.description:
About This Game

Help the moon girl defeat the ancient monster that stole the sun. The action in a fabulous adventure puzzle game takes place in the scenery of the polar cities of Norilsk and Dudinka under the mysterious light of the Aurora borealis.

  • The world: The world is based on fairy tales of the northern peoples of Russia, urban legends and myths in the scenery of the polar cities of Norilsk and Dudinka. The whole action takes place on a polar night under the mysterious light of the aurora borealis.
  • Plot: Moon girl fights with an ancient monster who stole the sun. Birds and animals come to the rescue, just as everyone wants to achieve the end of the polar night.
  • Puzzles: The game has a lot of puzzles, riddles, search for objects. Use the light! Only light can resist darkness!
  • Graphics: All backgrounds and characters are handmade in papier mache technique, which creates a unique visual style.
  • Music: Atmospheric game music. Also, at some levels, music affects the passage, there are musical puzzles in the game.

item.title: Lost Beacon
item.description:
About This Game

About the Game


Separated from his sled team by an avalanche, you must guide Brutus, the Siberian Husky, through the Alaskan wilderness – across lakes, cliffsides, and caverns, to rejoin his team and continue their mission to deliver lifesaving medicine to the people of Nome, Alaska. Avoid succumbing to the harsh environment as you explore and overcome puzzles and obstacles in Lost Beacon.

Interaction

Move obstacles and bound across crumbling platforms to bypass ravines, chasms, lakes, and glacial barriers.

Exploration

Explore a scenic open-world landscape as you search for your pack. Jump from ledges and across chasms to investigate new areas and uncover lost secrets.

Uncover History

Guided by your powerful sense of smell and the benevolent forest spirit, Silla, recover lost journals recounting the history of the Iditarod Trail and sled dogs. While searching for your team, learn about the Alaskan Diphtheria Outbreak and the 1925 Serum Run to Nome.

item.title: Blockbuster Inc. - Prologue
item.description:
About This Game



Welcome to Blockbuster Inc., the next-generation simulation game where you take the reins of your movie studio and pave your way to the cinematic hall of fame. Create groundbreaking films, nurture the next generation of acting talents, and usher in a new era in the movie industry.


Build it, decorate it, manage it! In Blockbuster Inc you choose how your studio looks, from wallpapers to the size of the rooms. You can choose working hours, buy shares from other studios, take loans, decide on the marketing and so much more! There is no end to good management!




Create your own sets, design your movies, choose actors, and pick their costumes, decide on camera movement and the behaviour of the actors, and that is not the end! After shooting the movie you can decide upon the sound design, layout of scenes and sfx!





Talent scouting is an art, and you are the artist. Unearth hidden gems among aspiring actors and turn them into the industry's brightest stars. But remember, each star comes with unique traits and demands. Handling the temperaments of divas and smooth operators alike will test your managerial sharpness.




Will you dominate the red carpet, winning accolades and securing your place in cinematic history? Manage your studio's reputation, make strategic decisions, and bask in the glory of your award-winning success.

item.title: Exotic Fighter
item.description:
About This Game

Dr Morgo has been testing on human subject forcing them to battle in a tournament to join his army. Only the strongest shall defeat Dr Morgo and his Minions, will it be you or parish? Experience the intensity of head-to-head battles with Exotic Fighter Choose from 10 iconic characters, then battle against friends

item.title: Divine Twins
item.description:
About This Game

Divine Twins is a captivating dual-character game where players embody a couple on an adventurous journey. Switch seamlessly between characters, with one automatically in companion mode.

This game combines cultivation, collection, adventure, and idle playstyles, catering to both hardcore and casual gamers. With minimal memory usage, it boasts expansive world scenes. As a couple, tend to a child and manage your unique home, complete with a yard, house, vegetable garden, pets, and a stable.

Engage in diverse activities such as farming, capturing mounts, resource gathering, pet training, pet races, and equipment synthesis. The game features an extensive equipment system, allowing you to switch characters and wield various weapons like swords, staves, bows, and more to challenge world bosses for powerful gear upgrades.

item.title: Saido
item.description:
About This Software

Saido is a modern browser for game modes and servers. Using Saido you can quickly find a community you really like, using powerful search and flexible filters, as well as connect to any game server directly from the application client.

Explore

auto-generated server playlists, new game modes and recently added servers on the Browse page.

Search

for servers that match your needs using the rich filters on the Search page.

Rich filters

Find the community that resonates with your interests using awesome filters available on almost every page.

Server page

with detailed description, statistics and community center (available in a few next releases).

No fake servers

There will be no fake servers in Saido.

item.title: Memorion
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a mesmerizing journey through the corridors of your own consciousness in "Memorion", a captivating puzzle game where you're tasked with recovering fractured memories and reconnecting with your past.



"Memorion" offers immersive puzzles and an emotional depth. Dive into a story that explores memory, identity, and the enigmatic connection between the past and present. As you explore this surreal dimension, you'll uncover the remnants of your life's most precious moments – the laughter of loved ones, the echoes of forgotten conversations, and the ripples of emotion that once defined you.

In your quest for remembrance, you must harness the power of interconnected neurons, unlocking pathways that will guide you through a tapestry of memories. Embark on a mesmerizing odyssey of self-discovery in "Memorion." Unravel the enigma of your existence and restore the fragments of your past as the echoes of your memories call you.

features


  • Immersive Puzzles: Encounter intricate puzzles and challenges that represent the fragments of your memories.
  • Neural Connection: Reconnect the neurons that symbolize your experiences and rediscover the vivid moments of your life.
  • Emotional Depth: Dive into a story that explores themes of memory, identity, and the enigmatic connection between the past and present.
  • Meditative Mood: Immerse yourself in a meditative atmosphere, visuals and music.

item.title: QI
item.description:
About This Game

QI

Sakura has asked Ryu to meet him at the school. She seems to have something important to tell him. A starry night and meeting between two friends. What challenge awaits Ryu !?

QI is a single one-boss-fight turn-based game made with RPG maker MV. Help Ryu defeat God for Sakura.


  • One-boss-fight
  • Defeat God


Notes
Around 120 min boss fight.

item.title: CardyHeim
item.description:
About This Game

CardyHeim is a 2D platformer adventure game where you will navigate the level from a side view. Throughout the levels in the game, you will face tough opponents. If you knock them down, they will drop cards that you can use against your next enemy. at the rest point, you can discard cards you do not need.

Collect Cards and build a deck that will suit your unique way of playing CardyHeim.

All images, videos, and sound provided are in-game capture
CardyHeim is developed by a single-person developer and all the Assets used in this game are listed in the credit menu.

item.title: Don't Wake Me Up
item.description:
About This Game

You’re trapped in a malfunctioning virtual reality with no memories. No memories, except of every video game you’ve ever played. Jack into a wild night in a virtual world you’ll never remember.

Armed with puns, pop culture, and a sharp dose of sarcasm, can you muddle your way through levels of satirical video game pastiches, back to reality?

Adventure through virtual worlds alongside a delusional gamer, an actual emo vampire (who really wishes he wasn’t an emo vampire), a poet from outer space, and a dashing princess in shining armor, among others! And perhaps, just perhaps, learn a bit too much about the kind of person you are when the real world isn’t watching.

A satire of the trapped-in-a-video-game genre, and a tragicomedy on the theme of dating sims.

Don’t Wake Me Up is a 400,000-word interactive novel about love in video games, where your choices control the story. Entirely text-based, and driven by your imagination. It is written by Baudelaire Welch, a professional game screenwriter currently working as a companion character designer for RPGs.

  • Play as nonbinary, male, female, straight or queer.
  • Travel through 6 worlds inspired by different video game genres
  • Wield a weaponised top hat
  • Rack your brains in a spaceship escape level inspired by old-school adventure games
  • Compete in a classical music-themed monster truck rally
  • Lose yourself in a cyberpunk casino
  • Date the Ultimate Video Game Fanservice Vampire
  • Or, date the Ultimate Video Game ‘Best Girl’ Waifu
  • A period piece honed in early 2010s internet cringe
  • Bifurcates entirely halfway through the game based on your love interest.

Sometimes true love is a wrong dialogue choice.

item.title: Bionic Rebirth
item.description:
About This Game

You are a man who was once known as "August", now only an experiment in a science facility that converts humans into AI killing machines. You wake up in the perfect time, as a rogue AI has risen to power and taken over the facility. Fight your way through the floors and find a way to escape or even stop the AI...





  • Explore the facility
  • Gather upgrades
  • Equip yourself with fate and a trusty gun
  • Fight your way through the maze
  • Defeat evil weaponized droids
  • Drodge the deadliest lasers





Do you have what it takes to shut down the facility and escape?

item.title: UDO
item.description:
About This Game

Dig through a mysterious planet in an arcade down-scroller roguelike that basically challenges you to dig deeper and deeper into a creepy hole with an oversized drill!

Go further to find mysterious technologies, improve your drill and suit, and make each run unique while being surrounded by creatures that definitely don’t want you in any of the 4 biomes in this weird planet you crashed into.

Features


Master your oversized drill's mechanics to blast your way down into the creepy hole in a rare down-scroller game format. You'll be amazed by the amount of different stuff you can do with it.



Enjoy super tight and rewarding gameplay as you unlock perks and extra powers for your character and drill.



UDO brings a familiar pixel art roguelike style with a unique easy to learn, hard to master gameplay mechanic.



Make each run unique by choosing between different suits and upgrades to shape your playstyle.

item.title: Dirge
item.description:
About This Game



Welcome to Dirge, a chilling multiplayer horror game set during the post-World War II period, when sinister monsters emerged and caused disturbances around the globe. Join the Paranormal Investigator Task Force and unravel the mysteries behind these supernatural occurrences. With up to four investigators and one player taking on the role of a terrifying monster, you must work together to survive and complete tasks to vanquish the unspeakable evil.

In a world recovering from the ravages of war, darkness has found a new foothold. The appearance of horrifying monsters has led to the formation of the Paranormal Investigator Task Force, tasked with venturing into the heart of darkness to uncover the chilling secrets hidden within the shadows. Each encounter will test your courage, skill, and resolve, as you face twisted beings with terrifying powers and confront the malevolent forces that now roam the earth.



Team up with friends locally or online as an investigator to explore haunted locations, defeat AI-controlled minions, and gather crucial items. Work together to overcome the unique challenges posed by each creature and complete the tasks necessary to banish the evil that haunts the world. Coordination and strategy are key, as you navigate treacherous environments and face the relentless onslaught of paranormal adversaries.



Experience heart-racing asymmetrical multiplayer in Dirge's online PvP. In each chilling match, one player assumes the role of the monster, while up to four others join forces as paranormal investigators. As the monster, you'll leverage the shadows, terrain, and your inhuman might to hunt the investigators, who must cooperate to complete their objectives while evading your pursuit. Every decision can mean the difference between survival or an untimely demise. In this game of cat and mouse, the stakes are high: will you succumb to fear or become the predator?



Death is only the beginning in Dirge. Once you fall, you don't merely spectate; you continue contributing to your team's success as a spirit orb. Free to roam the map and see beyond the veil, your spectral sight allows you to ping crucial items and lurking monsters for your still living teammates. This ensures you remain a strategic asset to your team's survival even from beyond the grave, transforming your experience from passive spectator to proactive Spooktator. Turn the tables on terror and guide your team towards victory, even in the afterlife.



Dive into a roster of uniquely talented characters, each bringing their own skills and advantages to the eerie gameplay. As an investigator, you'll choose from various members of the Paranormal Investigator Task Force, each with unique abilities, items, and skillsets that will help your team in the face of paranormal threats. You'll need to strategize and play to your strengths to survive the night.

On the other side of the fear, assume control of one of three spine-chilling monsters. Lurk unseen as the Wraith in the shadow realm, setting traps and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. Unleash devastating power as you temporarily become physical unleashing your attacks on the pathetic humans. Charge up with an extra reserve of power by resting in your dank lair. Kill every last one of the investigators as you master your powers and dominate the night. Check out other monsters as well.



Discover the richly detailed environments of Hillview Manor, Quetico Forest & City of Wakefield. Each hand-crafted map is filled with secrets and challenges that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you strive to claim victory in co-op or defeat your foes in PvP. Unravel the mysteries hidden within these eerie locations, and uncover the truth behind the supernatural forces that threaten the world.



Dirge has been a labor of love for our small team over several years, partially in Early Access. We've been shaping and refining the game based on feedback from our dedicated community, and many of the features you see today originated from your ideas. We always strive to incorporate the best suggestions into Dirge. As we transition from Early Access to Full Release, we can't wait to continue this journey with you. Together, we're creating a gaming experience unlike any other.

Delve into the haunting world of Dirge and confront your darkest fears today!

item.title: Under A Star Long Cold
item.description:
About This Game

You have 30 minutes to loot this place and pay your debts before the planet is destroyed. Intense stealth-action with permadeath. An exploration of agency and hope.

Stealth


Plan your approach


Take it slow


Quietly take out your enemies


Or go out in a flurry of lasers

item.title: Blocked In
item.description:
About This Game

Blocked In brings the nostalgia of the classic pen and paper game "Dots and Boxes" into the digital era, offering engaging gameplay for players of all ages. The objective remains simple – players take turns creating lines between adjacent dots to create boxes, earning points with each completed square. However, beware of your rivals! They will stop at nothing to block your path and steal your potential squares.

Features:

Online and Local Multiplayer: Create lobbies and invite friends or connect with players from around the world in online multiplayer mode. Alternatively, gather your friends and family for an local multiplayer matches on a single device, and enjoy the classic board game experience.

Variable Board Sizes: Customize your gaming experience by selecting from a range of board sizes. Whether you want a quick and intense match on a small board or a strategic, epic showdown on a larger canvas, the choice is yours.

How to Play:

  • Connect adjacent dots by creating lines horizontally or vertically.
  • When you complete a square by drawing the fourth line, you score a point and get an extra turn.
  • Be careful not to leave a box with one open side; your opponent will seize the opportunity to claim it.
  • Use your wit to force your opponent into traps and claim multiple squares in one move.
  • The player with the most squares at the end of the game emerges victorious!

item.title: Fixeight
item.description:
About This Game

TEAM UP FOR ONE HELLUVA CHALLENGE


Head out on an unforgettable adventure in Toaplan's FixEight, the spiritual successor to Out Zone. Pick your favorite hero from eight exceptional super soldiers, personalize them for ultimate freedom, and brave seven different hells. Immerse yourself in the heightened excitement, immersive storytelling, and awe-inspiring explosions that redefined the run-'n-gun genre back in 1992!

"In the fateful year HC109, humanity faces an unprecedented threat as omnipotent "Gods" from another dimension launch relentless assaults. In a last-ditch effort for survival, the Galactic Federation frees imprisoned super warriors and dispatches them on a dangerous mission: to eliminate these omnipotent beings and their formidable Heavy Infantry Corps on the enigmatic planet Fortune…"

ORIGINAL GAME FEATURES:

  • Teamwork Triumphs: Choose your champion from eight exceptional super soldiers, each with their unique style, and team up with friends for thrilling three-player co-op action.
  • Mission: Possible! Conquer seven intense levels, battling relentless foes and racing against time with precise controls.
  • Wonder Weapons: Arm your character with distinct super weapons featuring directional attacks and game-changing Specials. Boost your firepower with collectible items to unleash devastating attacks!

QUALITY OF LIFE IMPROVEMENTS:

  • Minimal Input Lag: Emulation, input processing, and rendering all complete on the same frame.
  • Quick Save using F1-F10, Reload with Shift+ F1-F10
  • Online leaderboards for Single Credit, No Assist, and Assisted plays.
  • Instrument panels with extra gameplay information and artwork.
  • Rewind the game between 10-18 minutes, depending on the action.
  • Capture sharable replays to immortalize your interstellar victories (or funny moments).
  • Assist Features such as auto-fire at multiple rates.
  • Very Easy Mode: Lower the difficulty to breeze through the adventure.
  • Pixel perfect or full-screen scaling in windowed or full-screen mode.
  • Rotate the gameplay in 90-degree increments.
  • Steam Achievements
  • Choose between Raw Input on Windows or Steam Input.
  • Hone your skills in the ultra-customizable practice mode!

item.title: Batsugun
item.description:
About This Game

THE FINAL CHAPTER IN TOAPLAN'S SHMUP SAGA


Set out on a breathtaking journey with Batsugun, Toaplan's shoot-'em-up swansong! Choose your hero from a roster of six charismatic pilots and three distinctive ship types, each brimming with personality. Immerse yourself in a world of dazzling graphics, devastating firepower, and an enchanting soundtrack, creating a sensory experience you won't soon forget. The accessible gameplay ensures that seasoned veterans and newcomers alike can revel in the unmatched thrill of victory!

In addition, the rebalanced Batsugun Special is also included, and features a visual overhaul with new colors and altered enemy behavior. A smaller hitbox and a shield protecting the ship from one hit, makes it easier which is needed as the barrage of enemy projectiles ups the ante for the true bullet hell factor. Batsugun Special introduces multiple loops, increasing difficulty with each completion. Can you master all four loops?

"As we prepare to launch with the Skull Hornets, our mission stands clear: overthrow the oppressive regime of King Renoselva A. Gladebaran VII. The path ahead is fraught with adrenaline-pumping battles and perilous missions. Our comrades and I are eager, but the question lingers: can we restore liberty to our people and emerge victorious?"

ORIGINAL GAME FEATURES:

  • Embark on an enthralling sci-fi adventure where every encounter feels like a mini-boss battle at minimum, demanding your utmost vigilance to survive.
  • Unleash mighty weapons like the Sky Mirage, Dragon's Whisper, and Judgement Flash to eradicate enemy threats.
  • Boost your firepower with experience points from defeated enemies.
  • Immerse yourself in the captivating space melodies of Yoshitatsu Sakai.

QUALITY OF LIFE IMPROVEMENTS:

  • Minimal Input Lag: Emulation, input processing, and rendering all complete on the same frame.
  • Quick Save using F1-F10, Reload with Shift+ F1-F10
  • Online leaderboards for Single Credit, No Assist, and Assisted plays.
  • Instrument panels with extra gameplay information and artwork.
  • Rewind the game between 10-18 minutes, depending on the action.
  • Capture sharable replays to immortalize your interstellar victories (or funny moments).
  • Assist Features such as auto-fire at multiple rates.
  • Very Easy Mode: Lower the difficulty to breeze through the adventure.
  • Pixel perfect or full-screen scaling in windowed or full-screen mode.
  • Rotate the gameplay in 90-degree increments.
  • Steam Achievements
  • Choose between Raw Input on Windows or Steam Input.
  • Hone your skills in the ultra customizable practice mode!

item.title: Tiger Heli
item.description:
About This Game

FLY THE ULTIMATE STEALTH JETCOPTER!


Tiger-Heli marked a revolutionary moment in 1985 as Toaplan's pioneering bomb-based vertical shooter, a true innovator of its time. Despite its unassuming appearance, its lifelike gameplay resonated with fans, earning widespread acclaim in Japan and around the globe. Its legacy lived on through Twin Cobra, released just two years later, and even today it remains a cherished gem among retro gaming enthusiasts worldwide.

"Under the relentless onslaught of a war-mongering nation, we face a dire and final stand at sunrise. These fanatics are resolute in their mission to conquer all they encounter, and thus far, they have triumphed in this brutal conflict."

ORIGINAL GAME FEATURES:


  • Experience the game that laid the foundation for vertical bomb-shooters, a timeless piece of retro gaming gold.
  • Collect various items and power-ups to bolster your arsenal, including health, cluster bombs, and nimble mini-jetcopters to secure victory.
  • Hunt for bonus points by targeting hidden spots and blazing race cars. Keep your eyes peeled to make sure you don't miss a thing!

QUALITY OF LIFE IMPROVEMENTS:

  • Minimal Input Lag: Emulation, input processing, and rendering all complete on the same frame.
  • Quick Save using F1-F10, Reload with Shift+ F1-F10
  • Online leaderboards for Single Credit, No Assist, and Assisted plays.
  • Instrument panels with extra gameplay information and artwork.
  • Rewind the game between 10-18 minutes, depending on the action.
  • Capture sharable replays to immortalize your interstellar victories (or funny moments).
  • Assist Features such as auto-fire at multiple rates.
  • Very Easy Mode: Lower the difficulty to breeze through the adventure.
  • Pixel perfect or full-screen scaling in windowed or full-screen mode.
  • Rotate the gameplay in 90-degree increments.
  • Steam Achievements
  • Choose between Raw Input on Windows or Steam Input.
  • Hone your skills in the ultra customizable practice mode!

item.title: Vimana
item.description:
About This Game

THERE IS NO ESCAPE!


Toaplan's Vimana invites you to a thrilling space showdown! This vertical shooter boasts breathtaking graphics, an epic soundtrack, and a captivating journey through Indian mythology. Crush your foes with mighty shots and utilize eight rotating shield orbs for ultimate defense. With accessible controls, players of all skill levels can dive into Vimana's exhilarating action!

"A once prosperous planet has been devoured by madness. Only a few righteous souls remain. They must restore peace to their world by reviving the sacred fighter craft Vimana in its holy temple. Go forth, Vimana! Restore peace to us all!"

ORIGINAL GAME FEATURES:

  • No Sweat, All Thrill: Enjoy simple controls and an exciting challenge level for non-stop fun!
  • Team Up: Take on malicious space pests with a friend in co-op mode for double the excitement!
  • Shoot with Style: Unleash barrages of wide-ranging shots and harness the power of eight rotating shield orbs to wreak havoc!
  • Get Mythical: Immerse yourself in an enchanting world filled with vibrant elements from Indian culture and Sanskrit epics!
  • Groove It Out: Pump up the volume and groove to the spectacular soundtrack by Toshiaki Tomizawa!

QUALITY OF LIFE IMPROVEMENTS:

  • Minimal Input Lag: Emulation, input processing, and rendering all complete on the same frame.
  • Quick Save using F1-F10, Reload with Shift+ F1-F10
  • Online leaderboards for Single Credit, No Assist, and Assisted plays.
  • Instrument panels with extra gameplay information and artwork.
  • Rewind the game between 10-18 minutes, depending on the action.
  • Capture sharable replays to immortalize your interstellar victories (or funny moments).
  • Assist Features such as auto-fire at multiple rates.
  • Very Easy Mode: Lower the difficulty to breeze through the adventure.
  • Pixel perfect or full-screen scaling in windowed or full-screen mode.
  • Rotate the gameplay in 90-degree increments.
  • Steam Achievements
  • Choose between Raw Input on Windows or Steam Input.
  • Hone your skills in the ultra customizable practice mode!

item.title: mischievous
item.description:
About This Game

This is a simple and fun cartoon style classic game.





In this game, you can adjust the movement direction through the WASD button, and you need to control the character's movement.

Apple may appear in random places on the screen

You need to manipulate the character to eat the apple (touch the apple) in order to earn points!

When your score is full, you will win!




There are more realistic scenes here, creating a rich and colorful gaming world. Throughout the game, players can enjoy excellent background music while enjoying high-definition pixel style graphics. It has a clear sense of detachment from reality, with less clear patterns but rich symbolic meanings, giving players more room for imagination. Come and give it a try.

item.title: VR Driver School
item.description:
About This Software

Do you think taking a driver's license is very difficult!
Especially subjects two and three are easy to fail!

The unique driving test simulator makes it easy to learn and practice driving.
It can effectively grasp the viewpoint and timing of turning the steering wheel.

Complete set of subjects 2: reverse parking, side parking, curve driving, right angle turning, designated parking on slopes, and driving practice and simulation exams for starting

Complete set of subjects: starting, shifting, right turn, left turn, lane changing, turning, overtaking, meeting, pulling over, passing public transportation, school, sidewalk, and mock exams

Including two models: C1 manual and C2 automatic.

Super realistic venue simulation! Real time simulation exams, non-invasive virtual environments, don't worry about hitting anything, go ahead and take it!

item.title: Cryodeath VR
item.description:
About This Game

Cryodeath is a single-player survival horror in VR.

You wake up from a cryosleep on a space station called Evriskon. The situation is grim. Your objective is to get to the escape pod through the maze of horror.

Each game the deck is procedurally generated. It's a huge maze of corridors and rooms. Walktroughs not going to help you.
You have to look out for tools and parts to craft gadgets that might help you on the way.
Be aware, you are not alone on that station.

item.title: The Braves: Beginning
item.description:
About This Game

What comes after life? A new beginning, of course! The Braves: Beginning is a free bullet hell with roguelike elements, packed with unique skills, various weapons, and hordes of enemies.

The game features:
- A rich roster of 20 characters, each with a unique design and distinct specialization.
- Fateful battles against evil in a range of arenas: Forest, Laboratory, Cemetery, and Mycelium Network.
- Lots of resources to collect, manage, and spend. Upgrade your equipment in the Forge and your characters in the Tavern.
- Awesome rewards for completing quests at City Hall.
- Fierce monsters and bosses.
- Endless combinations of diverse skills.

Test your heroes’ mettle! Travel across a ruthless fantasy world and meet the cute but ferocious monsters that inhabit it. Fight, collect resources, upgrade your gear and increase your stats. Do anything it takes to survive and claim victory!

item.title: Return of the USSR
item.description:
About This Game

You are a true patriot of the Soviet Union! 5 exciting levels await you, where you will be confronted by a variety of opponents - bandits, liberals, corrupt police officers, and other enemies of the Land of the Soviets. Avoid numerous traps set by the fifth column on the path to a Bright Future. Collect bottles to stun enemies and defuse traps. On your way you will see many places close to the heart of every resident of the post-Soviet space - courtyards on the outskirts of the city, the ruins of abandoned factories, a cozy village landscape.

Return of the USSR is a 2.5D platformer that will not leave indifferent anyone who is familiar with the warm atmosphere of life in the countries of the former Soviet Union. So help us bring back our beloved Soviet Motherland!

item.title: Hiddenverse: Kingdom Fall
item.description:
About This Game

The next chapter in the adventures of the Copperset Kingdom is here! Play this great hidden object game and search for hundreds of objects and play lots of mini games. Your task is to help Tom and his allies find out who attempted to take the life of Princess Sarah and restore order in the kingdom, over which clouds are gathering. Are the heroes ready to see the true face of the kingdom and how will they choose which side to take? Play over 100 puzzle levels and help Tom succeed in saving the kingdom.

* Picturesque steampunk and fantasy locations
* 100+ levels including HO, puzzle and match3
* More than 20 different game mechanics
* 500 unique game tools

item.title: ALAA-MOGUS MUST DIE
item.description:
About This Game




  • The slaves of Alaa-Mogus have become brutal in our world, URAANKHAI, we need to put them in their place

  • Letnik, Tuymaad Valley, Holiday Glade, Lake Saysar - our sacred places must be protected from Alaa-Mogus

  • Translations into Yakut and English languages

  • Don’t forget to drink BYYRPAKH and KYMYS for health and strength

  • YAKUT phonk in repertoire

  • Use different YAKUT techniques to shred the devils from the lower world

  • FIGHT the evil spirits from the OLONKHO epic face to face

  • Use various Yakut tools, such as a knife, batas, batyya, etc.



    URAANKHAI we are here?!

    URUY-AIKHAL! URUY-AIKHAL! URUY-AIKHAL! AYKHAL! AYKHAL!

item.title: My Recycling Center
item.description:
About This Game

Design and expand your own recycling center in this first-person simulation game. Take care of unloading, sorting and compacting the waste.

- Randomly generated customers and trash objects
- Authentic animation of garbage compactors
- Unload and sort customer's trash
- Realistic containers and machines for different types of trash
- Real-time destruction physics (runtime fragmentation)
- Buy, paint and configure new containers
- Waste paper, bulky trash, recyclables, scrap metal and more
- Almost 450 different trash objects
- 12 trash types and 10 different containers and compactors
- Use the management to configure the yard the way you like
- Earn cash and satisfaction to unlock new trash types and containers
- Use a cart or barrow to sort and distribute trash
- Purchase upgrades for machines and containers
- Use the pressure washer to clean the containers

Endless compacting and recycling fun!

item.title: Hexseeker
item.description:
About This Game

Combine hexagons in the quest for the ultimate goal - to find the "F". Discover tons of hype unlockables while you play, and utilize the autoplay feature to grind through levels automatically. Mouse, keyboard, and game controller input are all supported! Compete on numerous Steam leaderboards and enjoy over 20 achievements in this innovative "increaser" style puzzle game. You'll be absolutely puzzled and delighted in your quest to GET THAT F!

item.title: Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenbay
item.description:
About This Game


Set sail for the captivating seaside town of Kittenbay, a beautifully crafted 2D world where every hand-drawn detail tells a story. Kittenbay, alive with vibrant charm and hidden wonders, beckons you to explore its delightful secrets, both under the warm sun and beneath the starry night sky.



"Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenbay" elevates the hidden object genre with a twist of interactive storytelling and a dynamic day-and-night cycle. Your adventure spans both day and night, each phase offering unique experiences and secrets to uncover. During the day, bask in the town's sunny ambiance as you search for skillfully camouflaged cats blending into the lively scenery. When night falls, the town transforms, revealing a different set of hidden felines and mysteries under the moonlight, adding a layer of depth and replayability to your quest.



In addition to the feline-centric mission, Kittenbay is abuzz with interactive human characters, each with their own stories and conversations, enriching the world with a sense of community and life. Engage with these characters to uncover mini-stories that add heart and soul to your journey. A hidden puzzle, seamlessly integrated into the town's fabric, awaits those eager to delve deeper, weaving a tapestry of intrigue and charm.

Whether zoomed in, engaging with the town's inhabitants and uncovering secrets, or zoomed out, admiring the serene views of Kittenbay by day and night, "Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenbay" promises an experience that is both relaxing and mentally stimulating. Embark on this expanded adventure, where every corner of Kittenbay is a canvas of discovery, and let your curiosity be your compass in this world of enchantment and hidden delights.

  • Engaging hidden object gameplay with a day-and-night cycle, offering distinct experiences and challenges in each mode.
  • Interactive elements, including conversations with human characters, adding depth to the exploration.
  • Captivating mini-stories linked to each discovered cat and human character, enriching the narrative and world-building.
  • A vast, interactive environment filled with amusing Easter eggs and secrets that reveal themselves differently by day and by night.
  • Unique line-art graphic style, complemented by light effects to reflect the time of day.
  • An intriguing mystery with a fun twist waiting to be unveiled, evolving through the day-and-night progression.
  • Soothing and immersive background music that adapts to the day and night phases, enhancing the overall ambiance.
  • A range of achievements, including special ones for discoveries and interactions unique to the day or night.
  • Replayability factor heightened by the changing environment and interactions between day and night.
  • Autosave feature, ensuring that players' progress is automatically saved, allowing for seamless gameplay.

item.title: 妄想大碰撞 Fantasy Clash
item.description:
About This Game

《Fantasy clash》where you are a chef, a programmer, and an elite from all walks of life, experiencing a professional life in the story mode, battling wits and bravery in the challenge mode, and experiencing a hundred variations of skill-matching combinations in the tournament mode. Fighting with the flexible AI in a different style of fighting!

Feature:


Dream train
Selecting characters in the dream train and reaching various places to challenge every event or combat.Your combat skill will be more than a hundred types.Defend of attack?
Growing in strategy!



COMBO system
Each skill has its own effect and use,and the COMBO system will make them refreshed and more strategic.



Tournament mode
After skilled on the story mode, the tournament mode will be unlocked.You can build your own combat strategy freely here.The random rogue event and the opponent in this mode will make every game randomized.And you can make your own choice to build and respond to them.Have more fun and enjoy the whole experience!


Plan:
As an Independent Game which is made by few people.We would like to offer different fun for all of the players with this unique RTS game.
In this first relase,we will open 1 character(Chef),and the second character(Programmer) will come up in the free update which is coming soon.And more characters are coming!

item.title: A Million Murder Mysteries
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the thrilling world of A Million Murder Mysteries, where every second counts and every word holds the key to solving a gripping case. This intense text-based detective game challenges your analytical skills and deductive reasoning as you race against time to unravel a million mysteries.

In A Million Murder Mysteries players find themselves in the role of a seasoned detective tasked with solving a diverse range of cases, each with its own unique narrative and set of challenges. The catch? The clock is ticking, and you must sift through a vast sea of text to piece together clues, interrogate suspects, and ultimately identify the perpetrator before it's too late.

Immerse yourself in a rich and immersive narrative where every detail matters. From crime scenes to witness testimonies, every piece of information is crucial to solving the case. The game's dynamic storytelling adapts to your choices, ensuring a different experience with each playthrough. Will you crack the case or succumb to the pressure of time?

Key Features:


  • Race Against Time: The clock is ticking, and the pressure is on. Every decision you make, every clue you uncover, and every suspect you interrogate will determine the outcome of the case.
  • Text Analysis: Sharpen your detective skills as you analyze vast amounts of text for hidden clues. Uncover the truth by carefully examining witness statements, crime scene descriptions, and more.
  • Dynamic Storytelling: Your choices matter. Experience a branching narrative that adapts to your decisions, providing a fresh and unpredictable experience with each playthrough.
  • A Variety of Cases: Solve a million different murder mysteries, each with its own unique storyline, characters, and challenges. From high-profile assassinations to seemingly mundane crimes, no case is too small or too big.
  • Immersive Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a world of suspense and intrigue with atmospheric visuals and a captivating soundtrack that enhances the tension of each investigation.
"A Million Murder Mysteries" is not just a game; it's an adrenaline-fueled race against time, where your wit and intuition will be put to the ultimate test. Can you decipher the clues, identify the culprit, and close the case before the clock strikes zero? The challenge awaits, detective.

item.title: The Book of Good
item.description:
About This Game

Play as Yvonne in this first-person, short, single life horror adventure. There are no second chances. Complete the tasks her mother started and be careful--stay alive!

With only a flashlight and your wits, you must face unsettling encounters with the mysterious residents of the home. Find items and learn the secrets of the house and what lies below while searching for the Book of Good. Learn the history of the family who lived there. Who were Michelle, Tobias and Cassie? Why was the Book of Good so important to them?

You must find your brother who is lost in the mansion. Where is he, who took him? And make sure you stay away from what lives in the house--they are not friendly. They do not want you here.

Find the Book of Good and what it means. Get out of the house as soon as possible!

item.title: Pangolin Cassowary
item.description:
About This Game

Pangolin Cassowary is a short uniquely physics based 3D platformer. Forego jumping for aiming and kicking one of the two playable characters. Soar, roll, and bounce your way through the city's 5 unique areas.

Play simultaneously as the mammalian Pangolin to run, roll, bounce, and dash - and the mighty avian Cassowary to glide, kick, and swim.

Unlock new areas each with multiple objectives as you progress, as well as bonus challenges and secret areas.

item.title: Birds vs Dragons
item.description:
About This Game

🚀 Welcome to an Epic Adventure: Birds vs Dragons! 🚀

Embark on a heart-pounding journey in the realms of breathtaking platforms with our adventurous third-person shooting game - Birds vs Dragons. Immerse yourself in a world where danger lurks in every corner, and only the bravest souls can survive the onslaught of lethal dragons threatening to eliminate humanity from the planet.

🔫 Thrilling Third-Person Shooting Action:
Get ready for an adrenaline-packed experience as you take control of a courageous character armed with powerful weaponry. Navigate through stunning platforms that challenge your skills and reflexes, offering a dynamic and immersive third-person shooting gameplay like never before.

🐦 Tame Majestic Birds to Defend the Planet:
In Birds vs Dragons, your journey is not a solitary one. Harness the power of majestic birds by taming them to become your loyal companions in the battle against the menacing dragons. Each bird brings unique abilities and strengths, adding a strategic layer to the gameplay. Build your ultimate team of feathered warriors and unleash their fury upon your scaly adversaries.

🐉 Face Off Against Lethal Dragons:
The primary threat comes in the form of lethal dragons, each with its own fearsome abilities and tactics. Engage in intense battles where your shooting skills are put to the test, and only the most skilled dragon tamers can emerge victorious. Discover the weaknesses of each dragon species and adapt your strategy to conquer these formidable foes.

🌐 Explore Breathtaking Platforms:
Immerse yourself in visually stunning platforms that serve as the backdrop to your epic adventure. Traverse diverse landscapes, from lush forests to treacherous mountain ranges, each offering unique challenges and breathtaking views. The platforms are meticulously designed to enhance your gaming experience and keep you on the edge of your seat.

🌍 expand Your Horizons

That's just the beginning! Stay tuned for more updates as more thrilling adventures and mysteries to unravel.

👾 Join the Battle, Secure the Planet:
The fate of the planet rests in your hands. Are you ready to step into the shoes of a legendary dragon tamer and face the ultimate challenge? Gather your courage, tame your birds, and embark on a journey that will test your skills, strategy, and determination. The battle against the dragons awaits - let the chronicles unfold!

🎮 Birds vs Dragons - Where Adventure Meets Action! 🎮

item.title: Wulin Chess
item.description:
About This Game



"Wulin Chess" is an enthralling turn-based strategy game seamlessly blending a captivating plot with engaging gameplay. Craft diverse strategies to emerge victorious in the realms of dark arts and intricate storylines. Every move you make will cast unforeseen ripples across the chessboard and the world beyond. In this unfolding narrative, the stage is set for your strategic prowess – the encounter awaits your mastery!

Unique Art Style


The game exudes a Chinese dark martial arts style, distinct from traditional martial arts genres. Robust, tough, and carrying an air of solemnity, it encapsulates the essence of the game's interpretation of the martial world. Immerse yourself in the ultimate ink painting style, conveying an ancient yet pristine atmosphere.



Cultivate a Roster of Martial Heroes


In the storyline, gather characters (chess pieces) embodying unique martial hero traits, and flexibly assemble your exclusive lineup. Each hero possesses distinctive movement, attack, and skill attributes. Elevate their cultivation levels, choose powerful equipment and items strategically to enhance each character's formidable combat capabilities.



Fast-paced Combat Experience


In contrast to conventional strategy games, combat in Wulin Chess unfolds at a brisk pace with an elevated strategic complexity. Swiftly confront enemies, challenging your resource management skills for a victorious outcome. Within battles, a unique "position-based attack effect" mechanic has been introduced. Back attacks, side assaults, and pressure formations can inflict increased damage along with special movement effects.





Diverse Mechanics on the Battlefield


Building upon the traditional chessboard mechanics, the game incorporates various terrain elements, introducing obstacles, collisions, rewards, and traps, thereby escalating the difficulty of each battle. Alternatively, with a strategic approach, these elements might serve as unconventional tactics for you to defeat your opponents.



Seamlessly Woven Narrative


The plot and gameplay seamlessly intertwine, as you navigate these characters through each encounter. Along the way, you'll enlist new allies, confront formidable adversaries, and crucial plot twists will profoundly impact the game, putting your skills to the test on the battlefield.
